skill_e.tooltip:
Fizz hops on his trident towards the cursor, becoming briefly untargetable.

Reactivation: Fizz cancels the spell early, jumping towards the cursor a second time and dealing ? magic damage to nearby enemies.

If Fizz does not reactivate, he deals damage in a larger area and slows all enemies hit by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2 seconds.

skill_i.tooltip: Fizz can move through units and takes a flat amount of reduced damage from all sources

skill_q.tooltip: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing 1 physical damage plus ? magic damage. This spell applies on-hit effects.

skill_r.tooltip:
Fizz launches a fish that attaches to the first enemy champion it hits, slowing them, granting True Sight, and attracting a shark. After ? seconds, the shark erupts out of the ground, knocking its target up and knocking other enemies aside.

The farther the fish travels before attaching, the bigger the shark it attracts, dealing ? to ? magic damage and slowing by 40% to 80%.

skill_w.tooltip:
Passive: Fizz's basic attacks bleed his enemies, dealing ? magic damage over ? seconds.

Active: Fizz's next basic attack deals an additional ? bonus magic damage and empowers Fizz's attacks for ? seconds, dealing an additional ? magic damage on hit.

If the first attack kills a target, it refunds ? mana, resets its cooldown to ? second and does not grant the ? second on-hit buff.
